Name: 2 Many Pixels
About the game: Lockâ€™n Load into a world of pixels! 2 Many Pixels is an endless & fast-paced 2D minimal shooter. Blast enemies & unlock upgrades to help you survive for as long as possible! I bet you think you're a pro gamer, maybe even a god gamer and have been playing games all your life with thousands of hours played... Well, it's time to put those hours to use and show off your wicked-sick gaming skills to all your friends! Prove you're not a complete noob and that years of being addicted to playing video games has been worth it. Features Blast endless waves of enemies. Survive for as long as you can. Earn tokens from killing enemies. Equip permanent upgrades. Achievements! Trash Talker - to remind you how noob you are.
